alert.note: Alert for Hempstead; Howard; Little River; Sevier (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 7:42PM CDT until June 13 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Little River County in southwestern Arkansas... North central Hempstead County in southwestern Arkansas... Central Sevier County in southwestern Arkansas... Southeastern Howard County in southwestern Arkansas... Southeastern McCurtain County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 741 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Haworth, or 12 miles northwest of Foreman, moving east northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Nashville, Mineral Springs, Dierks, Horatio, Lockesburg, Winthrop, Ben Lomond, Corinth, Center Point, Oak Grove, Haworth, McCaskill, Silver Ridge, Moon, Cerrogordo, Geneva, Central, Shinewell, Muddy Fork and America. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
